article: an indian woman who holds several awards for the extreme length of her hair has ambitions of one day becoming a guinness world record holder .

smita srivastava , of allahabad , in the indian state of uttar pradesh , currently holds the record for having the longest hair in india -- documented at 6ft -lrb- 1.8 m -rrb- in the limca book of records .
her hair now stands at 7ft -lrb- 2.1 m -rrb- -- more than three inches longer than the height of the average basketball player .
